string.value: #p2120000# is hosting a Halloween party at the #rHaunted #m229000000##k. The friendly yet slightly eerie looking #r#p2120003##k awaits your arrival...

#p2120003# wants me to collect and bring her the #b#t2022255##k left over from making halloween Jack-o'-Lanterns. She says that she will give me a #b#t1002699##k which she made herself, as a gift in return. Let me follow #p2120003# to go make a Jack-o'-Latern. \n\n#i2022255# #t2022255# #b#c2022255#/50#k.
I brought the #t2022255# to #p2120003# and received a #t1002699# in return. Apparently, only 1 pumpkin hat is made per day, so I should go get myself a pumpkin hat to wear to the party.

Hello, dear guest, welcome. Is there something I can get for you? How about a cup of #t4031833#? Please let me know if there is anything I can help you with. My Master wishes to ensure that everyone has a wonderful time at the party.

Oh I almost forgot. The Master has prepared a special gift for all our guests. Whomever will bring back some sweet #t2022255# will receive a #b#t1002699##k, just right for celebrating the Halloween season! Would you like to participate in the #bGathering of #t2022255##k activities?

If you will bring back #b50 #t2022255#s#k left over from making Jack-o'-Lanterns, I will give you a cute little #b#t1002699##k in return. You have to make a Jack-o'-Lantern to say that you've properly celebrated Halloween!
If you would like to make a Jack-o'-Lantern, please talk to me and I will let you know where to go to make one. I hope you are enjoying yourself at the party...
Seems that you have no interest in collecting #t2022255#. Nothing I can do about that. Hope you're enjoying the party.

Hello, dear guest, welcome. Is there something I can get for you? How about a cup of #t4031833#? Please let me know if there is anything I can help you with. My Master wishes to ensure that everyone has a wonderful time at the party.

Oh I almost forgot. The Master has prepared a special gift for all our guests. Whomever will bring back some sweet #t2022255# will receive a #b#t1002699##k, just right for celebrating the Halloween season! Would you like to participate in the #bGathering of #t2022255##k activities?

If you will bring back #b50 #t2022255#s#k left over from making Jack-o'-Lanterns, I will give you a cute little #b#t1002699##k in return. You have to make a Jack-o'-Lantern to say that you've properly celebrated Halloween!
If you would like to make a Jack-o'-Lantern, please talk to me and I will let you know where to go to make one. I hope you are enjoying yourself at the party...
Seems that you have no interest in collecting #t2022255#. Nothing I can do about that. Hope you're enjoying the party.
Wow you've collected all #b50 #t2022255#s#k! Thank you so very much. I think I can make at least 10 cups of #t4031833# with that! Haha. Alrighty then. And now, the gift I've promised you.

All you need is a #t1002699# and no one will get on your case about threatening to pull a prank unless they hand you some candy. It's Halloween afterall, so enjoy yourself! That is the Master's greatest wish for all his guests.

Well well, we can only make 1 pumpkin hat per day, so if you wish to get another pumpkin hat, just come back tomorrow. I'll make you another halloween pumpkin hat. Of course you'll have to bring me some more pumpkin pieces to get a hat though, haha.
I guess you haven't been able to collect all #b50 #t2022255#s#k as of yet? Collect them while you're making the Jack-o'-Lantern and you should be able to collect 50 in no time.
